title: Empowerment-focused ocean logo refresh and site-wide asset swap

requirements.summary: Add updated ocean-themed empowerment logo assets (horizontal, icon, and social image) as static generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Updated logo visuals clearly incorporate an ocean identity (e.g., wave/sea forms) plus an unmistakable upward/leadership cue (e.g., rising crest, arrow, peak, lighthouse, etc.) without becoming overly complex.
Logo remains premium/clean and readable at small sizes (header height ~32â€“40px).
Color/contrast remains suitable on the site header/footer backgrounds (no loss of legibility).

file_operations.description: Add the newly generated empowerment-focused horizontal ocean brand logo asset (edited from the current premium horizontal logo) as a static file.
Add the newly generated empowerment-focused square icon variant as a static file, ensuring strong legibility at small sizes.
Add the newly generated wide social logo image (ocean identity + empowerment/leadership cue) as a static file for OG/Twitter sharing previews.

requirements.summary: Swap header and footer logo image src to the newly generated empowerment horizontal logo asset, ensuring consistent lockup.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo renders correctly and does not overflow the existing max-width constraints.
Footer logo renders correctly and matches the header logo (same asset/lockup).
No broken image links in header/footer on hard refresh.

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for brand asset static paths (e.g., header/footer logo and social image) to keep usage consistent and avoid accidental backend fetching.
Update the header logo image src to use the new static empowerment horizontal logo asset (via the shared brand assets module). Preserve existing sizing/max-width behavior.
Update the footer logo image src to use the same new static empowerment horizontal logo asset as the header (via the shared brand assets module).

requirements.summary: Update SEO/metadata to reference the new generated logo/social image assets (structured data + OG/Twitter).
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredData.tsx uses the new logo image filename for the Organization "logo" field.
frontend/index.html og:image and twitter:image reference the new generated social logo image filename.
After build, the referenced assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and load successfully in the browser.

file_operations.description: Update Organization structured data logo reference to the new empowerment logo image filename (preferably via the shared brand assets module).
Update og:image and twitter:image to reference the new generated social logo image at frontend/public/assets/generated/ocean-empowerer-solutions-logo-empowerment.dim_512x256.png.

requirements.summary: Ensure new logo assets live under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly as static assets only.
acceptanceCriteria: All new/updated logo images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
No frontend code attempts to fetch logo images from the backend canister.

file_operations.description: Ensure the generated assets directory is tracked even in clean checkouts/build environments (if not already), keeping all logo assets served as static files only.
Ensure all exported brand asset paths are direct static paths under /assets/generated (no backend/canister fetching), covering the horizontal logo, icon, and social image filenames.
